item.title: Brooklyn Banking in Style
item.description: Cruising through Brooklyn in style with a classic motorcycle and vintage car—where timeless design meets the city streets.

media:content.media:title: Brooklyn Banking in Style
media:content.media:description: Cruising through Brooklyn in style with a classic motorcycle and vintage car—where timeless design meets the city streets.

item.title: Daytona’s Best Pizza… And Chaos
item.description: Serving up some of Daytona’s best pizza while handling the chaos of a packed and lively day at the shop.

item.title: Will He Approve the Work?
item.description: The team completes the repairs and waits to see if the mechanic signs off, highlighting the importance of quality and precision.

item.title: Pulling an Army Truck Uphill!
item.description: Watch the crew tackle the challenging task of pulling a heavy army truck uphill, testing strength, skill, and teamwork.

item.title: Preparation For Congo's Independence Day!
item.description: Communities prepare to celebrate Congo’s Independence Day with decorations, events, and festivities marking this important national occasion.

item.title: Crazy Mud Rescue in Action!
item.description: The team tackles a challenging mud rescue, working together to free vehicles and navigate tricky terrain safely.

item.title: He Promised To Never Return To Congo!
item.description: After his experiences, he vows not to return to Congo, reflecting on the challenges and reasons behind his choice.

item.title: Dad Wants A Safer Car For His Daughter!
item.description: A father looks for a car that balances safety and performance, ensuring his daughter has a reliable and secure ride.

item.title: Winds Strong Enough to Rip Doors Off
item.description: Powerful winds cause damage and create hazards, showing the force of nature and the importance of staying safe outdoors.

item.title: Repo Team Calls The Cops
item.description: A tense situation unfolds as the repo team calls law enforcement to handle a tricky recovery safely and professionally.

item.title: Wanted $24K… Settled With a Trade
item.description: Negotiations for a $24,000 item lead to a successful trade, highlighting flexibility and strategy in making the deal work.

item.title: Jade Miners Scored Big!
item.description: After careful searching, the jade miners make a significant discovery, marking a rewarding moment in their quest.

item.title: $32K for a ’67 Camaro – Deal or No Deal?
item.description: A classic 1967 Camaro goes up for $32,000—exploring whether the price matches the car’s value and condition.

item.title: He Spent A Lot Of Money On This Truck!
item.description: He puts significant money into this truck, exploring its features and potential value in a trade or sale.

item.title: The $50,000 Chevelle Negotiation That Got Intens
item.description: Negotiations heat up over a $50,000 Chevelle, showing the stakes and strategy involved in classic car deals.

item.title: From $18K to $21K… Deal Done!
item.description: A deal that started at $18,000 closes at $21,000, showing the outcome of careful negotiation and discussion.

item.title: Rare 6-Cylinder Camaro Still Running
item.description: A classic Camaro with its original 6-cylinder engine still intact and running, offering a rare glimpse into a lesser-seen side of muscle car history.

item.title: Trading Challenge: Kid Beats the Pro
item.description: Starting with just two phones, a trade for a stop sign. The young competitor walks away with $300 while the pro earns $224.

item.title: From $7,995 to $10K, Deal or Not?
item.description: A Texas-based classic with a rare Austin motor sees its price climb from $7,995 to $10,000. Is the upgrade reasonable, or a tough sell?

item.title: That’s Mint… And That’s Expensive!
item.description: A simple petrol can turns out to be both rare and valuable, showing how everyday items can surprise collectors with unexpected price tags.
